snippet: Figures released on Friday showed that the European Central Bank had received 455 billion euros, or $578 billion, of overnight deposits from European banks, the highest figure since the euro zone was created in 1999.
abstract: Figures released on Friday showed that the European Central Bank had received 455 billion euros, or $578 billion, of overnight deposits from European banks, the highest figure since the euro zone was created in 1999.

headline.main: European Banks Stash Extra Cash With Central Bank
